text: The Grace Jones Story is a collection of songs recorded by Jamaican singer Grace Jones, recorded from 1977 to 1993. The collection does not include any tracks from 1985 Slave to the Rhythm album due to licensing issues with ZTT Records. == Track listing == Disc One # "That's the Trouble" (Grace Jones, Pierre Papadiamandis) \- 3:39 # "I Need a Man" (Pierre Papadiamandis, Paul Adrian Slade) \- 3:24 # "La Vie en rose" (Édith Piaf, Louis Guglielmi, Mack David) \- 7:28 # "Send in the Clowns" (Stephen Sondheim) \- 7:35 # "What I Did for Love" (Marvin Hamlisch, Edward Kleban) \- 5:17 # "Do or Die" (Jack Robinson, James Bolden) \- 3:22 # "Fame" (Jack Robinson, Gil Slavin) \- 5:36 # "Am I Ever Gonna Fall in Love in New York City" (Jack Robinson, Vivienne Savoie Robinson, James Bolden) \- 5:28 # "Don't Mess with the Messer" (Grace Jones, Pierre Papadiamandis) \- 4:52 # "Sinning" (Grace Jones, Pierre Papadiamandis) \- 5:06 # "Saved" (Jack Robinson, James Bolden, Vivienne Savoie Robinson) \- 5:01 # "Warm Leatherette" (Daniel Miller) \- 4:29 # "Love Is the Drug" (Bryan Ferry, Andy Mackay) \- 7:11 # "The Hunter Gets Captured by the Game" (Smokey Robinson) \- 3:48 Disc Two # "Private Life" (Chrissie Hynde) \- 5:13 # "She's Lost Control" (Bernard Dickin, Peter Hook, Stephen Morris, Ian Curtis) \- 8:23 # "Pull Up to the Bumper" (Kookoo Baya, Grace Jones, Dana Mano) \- 3:41 # "Walking in the Rain" (Harry Vanda, George Young) \- 4:20 # "Use Me" (Bill Withers) \- 5:05 # "Nightclubbing" (David Bowie, Iggy Pop) \- 5:06 # "I've Seen That Face Before (Libertango)" (Ástor Piazzolla, Barry Reynolds, Dennis Wilkey, Nathalie Delon) \- 4:30 # "My Jamaican Guy" (Grace Jones) \- 6:01 # "The Apple Stretching" (Melvin Van Peebles) \- 7:10 # "Nipple to the Bottle" (Grace Jones, Sly Dunbar) \- 5:53 # "I'm Not Perfect" (Grace Jones, Bruce Woolley) \- 3:59 # "Love on Top of Love" (David Cole, Grace Jones) \- 6:16 # "Someone to Love" (Grace Jones, Chris Stanley) \- 4:49 # "Sex Drive" (Sheep on Drugs) \- 4:00 ==References== ==Other websites== * The Grace Jones Story on Rate Your Music Category:2006 albums Category:Greatest hits albums Category:Grace Jones albums Category:Funk albums Category:Reggae albums Category:R&B; albums
title: The Grace Jones Story
